page.title: 09SHOPS
page.content: There are 4 shops in our area. They are all in Ewyas Harold. There is a chemist, greengrocer's, butcher's and an antique shop. The chemist's used to sell a lot of medicine but now it sells things like gardening equipment, stationery, birthday cards and household goods. The greengrocer's has a Post Office as part of it. The things that they sell are fruit and vegetables, a little meat and bread, knitting equipment, cereals, tinned food and sweets. The antique and jeweller's shop is next door to "The Dog" public house. The last shop is the butcher's. There used to be a baker's but this has recently closed.Almost everybody in the village uses the local shops - over 40% use them for almost all their shopping.
